revision.comment: DarkShadow moved page [[Intel PRO / Wireless 3945ABG (HP)]] to [[Intel PRO/Wireless 3945ABG (HP)]] over redirect
revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Intel_PRO/Wireless_3945ABG_(HP) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Intel |model = WM3945ABG |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (HP) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AG108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 4222 |subvendor_id = 103c |subdevice_id = 135b |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PD9WM3945ABG,B94WM3945ABG |icid = 466Q-WM3945ABG |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:13:02,00:19:D2,00:1B:77,00:1F:3C
|chip1 = Intel;PC82534MDE; |chip2 = Intel;W62534RDE; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/03/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Equal to the [[Intel PRO/Wireless 3945ABG]] but with subsystem ID's from HP, :as HP computers only accept cards with the correct subsystem.
Tested cards include.. *Assy No. 396331-001, Spares No. 407576-0001, OUI: 00:1B:77, same subsystem *Assy No. 396331-001, Spares No. 407576-0001, OUI: 00:19:D2, same subsystem *Assy No. 396331-001, Spares No. 407576-0001, OUI: 00:1F:3C, same subsystem *HP Spare # 407674-001, Assy No. 396331-001, Spares No. 407576-0001, OUI: unk, card may not work *Assy No. 396331-001, Spares No. 407576-001, SPS# 4075750-001, AS# 396331-001, OUI: 00:13:02
[[Category:English Documentation]]
